# zosmf Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "zosmf" {
  host     = "https://192.168.1.32:10443"
  username = "ibmuser"
}
```

### Required

- `host` (String)

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
